PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2019-02182019-03-25,  ,  FIN,  , 
ActGreenhouse Gas Pollution Pricing Act
SubjectRegulations Amending Part 1 of Schedule 1 and Schedule 2 to the Greenhouse Gas Pollution Pricing Act
PrecisRegulations Amending Part 1 of Schedule 1 and Schedule 2 to the GREENHOUSE GAS POLLUTION PRICING ACT (GGPPA) in order to add a list of provinces and territories to Part 1 of Schedule 1 and Schedule 2 to have Part 1 of the GGPPA apply in these backstop jurisdictions.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2019-0079 Publication Date: 2019-04-03
AttachmentsAttachment
